title: How can I change League of legends language?
body:
I am trying to change NA League of legends language with add -ko_KR in  yaml file like below, but it found error 003 ( Found a error in this client [restart now] . I don't need to change text language I just want to change voice to Korean... Can someone help me with this problem???  
 
available_locales:
    - en_US
    - ko_KR

replies.body: Korean isn't one of the available languages for the NA region. Check out the [**list of available languages**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594) to see what's all open for the regions you play on.
